review.title: “interactive”
review.pros: Pros – d-say strives for the best possible solutions for it's clients. the people are proffessional and fun to work with. the salaries are good.
review.cons: Cons – the company is not interested in winning awards in the creative field, therefore many innovative ideas don't make the cut.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – put a greater emphasis on the strategy and creative departments
